sources.title: HIGHWAY 13 (1948) ROBERT LOWERY â™¥ PAMELA BLAKE
sources.description:
Director: William Berke
Starring: Robert Lowery, Pamela Blake, Dan Seymour

After Norris Trucking loses several vehicles in a series of mysterious crashes, company driver Robert Lowery finds himself enmeshed in a whodunit with more twists than pretzel. Is it murder on wheels or the curse of Highway 13?

metadata.Plot: Hank Wilson is a truck driver for a a big transportation company which is in financial straits. He is in love with Doris Lacy, a waitress at the truck-stop where the company has its truck fleet serviced. Frequent accidents near the place leads the company to hire a private detective to investigate, and after he is murdered, Hank is arrested as a suspect. The insurance company that covers the fleet has him released and he is sent back to work with instructions to investigate the accidents on his own. The trail leads to the uncle of Doris, and one of the part-owners of the company.
metadata.Actors: Robert Lowery, Pamela Blake, Clem Bevans
